com.microblink.view.surface

Interface ICameraView.CameraViewEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCameraView.BaseCameraViewEventsListener
    Enclosing interface:
    ICameraView

    public static interface ICameraView.CameraViewEventListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCameraPinchEvent(float pinchFactor)
      Called when used pinch zooms a camera surface.
      void onCameraTapEvent(float x, float y)
      Called when user taps a camera surface.

    • Method Detail

      • onCameraTapEvent

        void onCameraTapEvent(float x,
                      float y)
        Called when user taps a camera surface. Reported coordinates are relative within camera preview frame.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the tap event
        y - y coordinate of the tap event

      • onCameraPinchEvent

        void onCameraPinchEvent(float pinchFactor)
        Called when used pinch zooms a camera surface.
        Parameters:
        pinchFactor - Pinch scale factor
